name: Fiscal Solution for E-commerce
author: Fiscal Solutions

sections.description:
FS4E is a service that enables fast and easy fiscalization of WooCommerce online Stores in the territory of the Republic of Serbia.

The Fiscal Law of the Republic of Serbia obliges all e-commerce sellers to record their turnover and issue fiscal invoices.
At the same time, e-commerce solution must be certified by Tax Authority.

With a very simple installation of certified FS4E plug in, your online store will meet all fiscal requirements and secure legal online business operations.

How to use

With our fiscal solution, you meet all legal requirements and open a perspective for the future.

KEY FEATURES LIST

  • Fiscalize transations
  • Return transactions
  • Creating fiscal bills ready for print

Minimum requirements

  • PHP 7.1 or later
  • WordPress 5.6 or later
  • WooCommerce

This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working

Default Method

To do an automatic install of Fiscal Solutions for E-commerce (FS4E), log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field type “Fiscal Solutions for E-commerce (FS4E)”. Once you have found it you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now” and then “Activate”.

Easy Method

  • Download zip file
  • Navigate to the ‘Add New’ in the plugins dashboard
  • Navigate to the ‘Upload’ area
  • Select zip file from your computer
  • Click ‘Install Now’
  • Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

Old Method

  • Download zip file
  • Extract the zip file directory to your computer
  • Upload the zip file directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  • Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to install a WordPress plugin.
sections.faq:
How can I get support if the plugin is not working?

If you have any questions or have a problem with the plugin you can write us at support@fiscal-solutions.com

Is Fiscal Solution for E-commerce certified to be used in the Republic of Serbia

Yes, Fiscal Solution for E-commerce is certified by the tax authority of Serbia and can be used in the Republic of Serbia

What payment media can I use to buy a licence for Fiscal Solution for the E-commerce plugin

For now only payment with Credit cards is supported

How long will my licence last?

Licence is bought for a period of one year and will last 365 days

What countries does Fiscal Solutions for E-commerce support?

Fiscal Solution for E-commerce is only available for use in the Republic of Serbia

Where can I find documentation for Fiscal Solution for the E-commerce plugin?

When you buy a licence we will send you the necessary documentation by mail.
